page.title: 20HOUSING
page.content: There are quite a lot of different types of housing in the Thornbury area. Private houses are found on the Park Farm Estate, Chatsworth Park, the Barrett Estate and Chiltern Park. There are some council houses which are rented and some which people ate buying from the council, these are mainly situated near the Health Centre. There are flats for old people next to Saint Mary's Church Hall. "Castlefields" is a development of bungalows being built for old people,starting price will be about Â£27,000. There are new terraced, semi_detached, detached houses and bungalows in our area ranging from Â£22,000_Â£68,000 in price.
